QUERY.TITLE: Human Cloning and Ethics
QUERY.DESC: Find documents debating ethical or moral problems related to eventual genetic cloning of human_beings .
QUERY.NARR: Relevant documents will report discussions on the ethical problems raised by the possibility of creating human clones . Proposals for legislation to ban human cloning for ethical reasons are also relevant . Reports on the technological limits and difficulties of cloning methods applied to humans are not relevant .
